meanings.definition: A highly paid fashion model who has achieved international success and fame.
meanings.sent1: The supermodel walked confidently down the runway.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a supermodel and grace the covers of magazines.
meanings.sent3: The supermodel tripped on her own shoelaces, causing a moment of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance on the catwalk made her a true supermodel in the eyes of many.
meanings.sent5: The supermodel's radiant smile captivated audiences worldwide.

meanings.sent1: She hoped to supermodel for top designers one day.
meanings.sent2: He decided to supermodel for the upcoming fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to supermodel by strutting around with a toy crown.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to supermodel effortlessly impressed the judges.
meanings.sent5: The young girl loved to supermodel in front of the mirror, pretending to be on a runway.

meanings.sent1: The magazine featured an article on the latest supermodel trends.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe was filled with supermodel-inspired clothing.
meanings.sent3: The party had a supermodel theme, with guests dressing in glamorous attire.
meanings.sent4: The supermodel industry was booming with new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Her style was undeniably supermodel, drawing attention wherever she went.
